div.p:
Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
vj die mensis marcij Anno quo Supra

the said' day the ballieis assignit to William of gareauche
the xx day of marche Instan' with his avne consent to ansuer'
perempturlie to the borghe strekit one him be Elizibeth'
Setone for the wranguys' haldin fra hir' of ane Siluer
tuschay scho deliuerand' ane Siluer pece contening v vnce

the said' day thome buchan and thome hill deponit the gret
aithez that thai bystud and saw Jonhne Retre ger' mett thre
pvncionis terceance of flour' send' to him in Johne Callatis
Schip be gilbert mvs' opidan of Deipe quhilkis contenit
vij bollis and j partis of flour' of the mesour' of the said' burghe

the said' day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' William forspekar
that Johne futy suld' pay vj s' and vi iiijor d' to Sandy Rolland' for
the spillinge of his clath eftir the tenour of the ak obefor et cetera

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
ix die mensis marcij quo Supra

The saide day mathow branche grantit the
obligaciomobligacion maid' to Williame hendirsone be him
of fyve franche crovnis and ale pontis contenit
In the samyn the quhilk the balyeis chargit the
said' mathow to pay within terme of law

the said' day the aldirman and balyeis assignit this day
xv dais to William Wormet to ansuer' perempturlie
to Jonhne Retre for his part of j d' kyst of buttour'
extending to ltj li' xlviij sous' of the rest of xiiij
hidis and xvj Sous' of the Rest of his bile of Rekning

The said' day comperit Certan crathtis men' and nychtbouris
of the tone and schew thar decret gevin' apone Jonhne
futj to pay iiij s' to cristiane ancroft for the spillin
of ane pece of Carsay clath in the weyffyn'
and j li' of wax to Sanct nicholes kirk and the
haly blud' clythtis quhilkis iiij s' the saide
Johne futy has payt

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xiij
die mensis marcij quo Supra

head.add: productio carte quondam David menyeis senioris

div.p:
Eodem die comparuerunt thomas leslie et Johannes mar' procuratorio nomine magistri
Will Walterj leslie Rectoris de menmuir' et In medio
produxerunt quandam cartam Sigillis quondam Dauid menyes senioris
gilberti chamer tunc ballivi Sigillat' de terra Interiore Jacente
inter terram alexandri menyes in vico Castri ex orientali et terram Willelmi
goldsmith ex occidentali et terram Interiorem dicti magistri Walterj versus
austrum In qua mentio facta fuit quod dicte terra anterior
solueret priorj et conuentui ordinis carmelitarum dicti burgi annuatim
vnum annuum Redditum viginti solidorum / de data / octavo die
mensis Junij anno Domini Millesimo quadringentesimo Septuagesimo quinto

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
xvjo die mensis marcij anno quo Supra

The said' day Alexander burnat sone and appering ayr' to
Alexander burnat of leys for' Androw burnat his brothir and Alexander myrton'
for him self and his wyf oblist tham be the fathtis of thar
bodiis to pay to Jonhne horvm of carndavy tene merkis
vsuale money of Scotland' for the Renunciand' of al Richt that he
has or' ony wys' mycht haue his ayris or assignez' in to or with
ane annuele Rent of xiij s' and iiij d' clamit of the land' of vm
quhile Richard' Kintor' eftir the tenor' of ane decret Arbitrale
gevin be consentis of batht the said partiis at thar termes that Is
to say fourtj s' within xv dais hereftir Ande savin merkis
at Witsonday next thereftir follouing the said alexander burnat payand'
the half of the said' tene merkis And' the sad alexander myrtone
the tothir half equalie betuix thame but fraude or gile Ande
the said' Androw oblist him be the fath of of his bodie to releyve the
saide alexander Anent the pament of the sad Some

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xviij
die marcij anno quo Supra

The saide day Jonhne Colisone complenyeit to the balyeis
that Alexander hay litstar hed' stribulit him sayand' in the consistorj
he suld' put out batht his ene the saide alexander accusit
be the balyeis for the stribulance of the saide Johne as
said' is put him in the balyeis will and to Amend'
at the wile of the saide Jonhne for the quhilkis the
said' Alexander be his avne tonge gravnt was in ane Amerciament of
the Court and to amend' as law wile and forber' in tym
to Cum

Eodem die Alexander hay amerciatur per assisam Juratam ex ore alexandri rede
prelocutoris assise pro perturbio alexandri thomsone Cuj emendabit
ut Jura volunt et Idem alexander thomson' quitus de perturbio dicti
alexandri

Eodem die alexander hay litstar amerciatur per dictam assisam nomine et
ex parte Andree Crab pro quo respondebat pro perturbio alexandri
thomsone Cuj emendabit et cetera Ac ordinatum fuit per assisam
quod dictus alexander hay solueret x s' prefato alexandro pro emenda et cetera
Ac si aliquem in postrum perturbauerit soluet xl s' ad
fabricam ecclesie sine remissione qui quidem alexander hay de
mandato balliuorum oneratus fuit per philippum Dunbrek
et Willelmum scrimgeour seriandos per tactum virgarum suarum ad
remanendum infra dictum pretorium quousque soluerit dictos x s'
diliberatos per dictam assisam Insuper ordinatum fuit per
assisam quod Idem alexander hay feceret dictum Andream crab
seruum suum comparere coram preposito et ballivis feria quinta proxime
futura In pretorio ad inueniendum plegium legalem quod dictus
Alexander thomsone erit Indempnis pro eo aliter quam per
viam Juris ac causaret dictum Andream Crab venire
in proxima dominica tempore processionis magne
misse cum candola vnam li' Cere continen' peten'
veniam nudo capite a dicto alexandro thomsone et offeren'
Cereum ad lumen Sancti sanguinis

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xx
die marcij quo Supra

the said' day thome Wilson grantit him avand to
Elizibetht blinsele xij s' and xiij d' for x f'
of ber' quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay
In continent

the said' day the aldirman and balyeis with avis' of the court
ordanit the flessaris that Nane of thame bocht by fische
quhile j hour' eftir nowne that the tone be seruit vndir
the pane of law and ane Amerciament vnforgevin Item
that thai be Redy euere man with his skule to brek fische
to the seruing of the tone and to tak nay mair' bot j d'
of the Schillingis for thar labour' Ande that nay laddis
brek fische vndir the pane of law and j amerciament of the court

the said' day Alexander hay litstar Come law bourghe that alexander
thomsone salbe skathles for Androw crab ale wais bot as
law will and Androw futhes Come law borghe' for the said' Alexander
thomsone that the said Androw crab salbe skathles of him bot
as law wile And' atour the said alexander hay come souerte
for Androw Crab to fulfill ale thingis contenit in the ak obefor'
be his hande vphaldin

xxiij day of marche forsaid' Duncan portar come Souerte be his
hand' landis and gudis to Jonhne of mar' balye that the gudis of airschip
of vmquhile Androw Scrogis salbe furtht cumand' to the richtuys'
ayr' for mady cragis his widew

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxiij die
marcij

the saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' mathow
branche forspekar that William scrogis his gude fadir and his brothir sal suer'
that the saide William promittit nocht to deliuer to Robert Knyb xxij s' or
j cow and j calf one monunday eftir the trinite day next to cum he salbe
quyt of the said' Robertis challance Ande gif thai suer' nocht Androw mathe
sone and the said Robert sal suer' that the said' William promittit the saide
xxij s' or the cow and the calff than the said' William sal pay the samyn siluer
or cow to the said' Robert

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
vltimo die mensis marcij Anno Domini Millesimo quingentesimo

the saide the aldirman and balyeis assignit to Johne ramsay
to bring alexander Iruyn in foulay befor thame the thride day of
aprile to ansuer' at the Instance of Johne Knollis for vj s' and viij d'
and falyeand tharof to pay the saide Siluer

The said' day It was fundin that William of gareauche is aving'
to Jonhne ramsay vj s' to be pait within terme of law

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem primo die mensis aprilis
anno Domini millesimo et quingentesimo

the saide daye marione stabyllar' with thome leslie hyr' for
spekar' complenyeit to the aldirman and balyeis that Eellen colle
the wedow of wmquhyll Robert of bomhem hade grytlie
strowblyt hyr' and strikyne hyr' the quhylk the saide ellen de
nyit and in contenent' the saide action' was put to the decisione
of ane assys' of thir personis wndir wyrtin that is to say John'
gylbert menyes' Wylliam schamer Robert crag Androw fyff John
blak Johne' ratre William findeson villiam gary alexander lyndissa David
Kyntor' Wyll murra and Johne' thomson' quhylkis ryplie awy
syt the gret haitht sowrne the preuis wytnes' Richtis and reso
nis of bath the parteis harde and sene and ondirstandin deliuerit and fand'
the said' Ellen had' strublit the said' marion for' the quhilk scho
In ane amerciamente of the court and to amend' as law wyll and to forber'
in tyme to cum and scho quyt of all strublans' of the said ellen'
and that was giffin for doum

The said' day the said' ellene was conuictit be the said' assis'
for' the strublance of Johne' of mar' ane of the balyeis of the
said' burgh in the execusione of his office wndir cilence
of the nicht for' the quhylkis scho was in ane amerciament of the court
ande to amend' as law wyll and forber' in tyme to cum
and he quit of ale strublance of the said' Ellen and that was giffin
for' doume

The said' daye the said' ellene colle was conuictit be the
said assis' for' strublance of William scrimgeour ane of the offeciaris
of the said' burgh wndir cilence of the nicht in the execusiom' execusion
of his offis for the quhelkis scho in amerciament of the court
and to amend' as law wyll and forber' in tyme to cum and he
quyt of all strublance of the said' ellene' and that was' giffin
for' doume

the said' day William of buchan was' conuictit be the said' assys'
for' strublance of William scrimgeour offeciar' ondir sylence of the nicht
excersand' his offis' lauchfully for' the quhylkis the said'
William was' in amercement' of the cowrt and to amend' as law
wyll and forber' in tyme to cum and the said' William scrimgeour quit of
all strublance of hyme of the said' William bochkane and that
was' giffin for' doum'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
tercio die mensis Aprilis anno quo Supra

the saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Dauid Kyntor
forspekar that the said' Siluer belt follouit be Elizibetht apone William
of gareauche sal remane with the saide Williame vnto the tyme he
be pait of samekile as he preuis that the said' belt was laid' in wede
to him

Eodem die magister Andreas Cadiow fecit constituit creauit et nominavit Robertum
blinsele Willelmum Wormet richard' Waus et Dauid liel coniunctim et divisim suos
legittimos procuratores actores factores et cetera ad prosequendum terram quondam Johannis parfyt pro
annuo Redditu sibi de eadem debito ac in omnibus aliis actionibus ipsum tangentibus
In vberiore forma procuratorij promitten' de Rato et grato cum omnibus terminis et
Clausulis necessariis et oportunis

Curia balliuorum burgj de Aberdene' tenta in pretorio eiusdem
sexto die mensis Aprilis Anno quosupra

The saide day Dauid theman grantit hym to deliuer' ane Jak
ane sellat and ane suorne byrsyne pot to Jonet traile and band' hir pas'
with him and Ressaue the said' gudis and als the aldirman and bailyheis chargit
the said Dauid to deliuer the covntour to the said Dauid' Jonet quhilkis the
said' Dauid' grantit to deliuer Richtsua to the said Jonet quhilkis gudis
he had of layne of hir

The said' day the balyheis assignit friday that nixt to Jonet traile
the Relict of vmquhile Jonhne Westland' to ansuer for the airschip
pertening to the ayr' of the said Jonhne quhilkis scho has in hir handis
that It mycht be put in frendis handis to the vtilite of the said' ayr'
in ferme keping And' the said' Jonet to bring hir Euidentis and' documentis
the said' day quhilkis scho wald' wse quhat possession' scho had' of the said
Johnis landis

Eodem die Joneta traile Relicta quondam Johannis Westland fecit
constituit creauit et nominauit Jacobum Kennarty suum sponsum
et malcomum crage suos procuratores Irrevocabiles coniunctim et diuisim

The said' day the bailyheis chargeit William scrimgeour James
leis and Andrew nachtj officiaris to warne' William gareaucht to
friday that nixt cumis as day of peremptour to preif quhat Elizibeth
setonis belt is awand' hyme And' als to ansuer to margaret
scheraris Instance it that scho has to say to hyme the said' day

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem ix die aprilis
anno Domini Millesimo et quingentesimo

the saide day Donald' baxtar was quyt of xv franche
crovnis and xxxtj Inglis grotis clamit be William Wilson'
be ane Suorne assis' Alexander rede forspekar
